name: MSCRMBackupOnlineInstance
description: Creates a backup of a PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 Environment
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: apiUrl
inputs.label: ApiUrl
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the Service Url for your environment region as per (documentation)[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api]

inputs.name: instanceName
inputs.label: Instance Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique instance name. E.g. for :https://contoso.crm.dynamics.com, the value would be: contoso

inputs.name: notes
inputs.label: Notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: The notes you want included with the backup

inputs.name: backupExistsAction
inputs.label: Backup already exists action

options.Error: Error - Attempt to stop the pipeline
options.Continue: Continue - Attempt to take another backup

inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to take if a backup with same label already exists for this instance. Can sometimes occur if re-running pipeline after backup already taken.

inputs.name: waitForCompletion
inputs.label: Wait For Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Setting this to true will cause the task to wait until the backup completes

inputs.name: sleepDuration
inputs.label: Sleep Duration (seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The frequency to query the status of the backup job while waiting for completion
